results.name: nintendogs + cats: Golden Retriever & New Friends
Harvest Moon: MORE friends of Mineral Town

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows™ 7 SP1, Windows™ 8.1 or later, or Windows™ 10
  • Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 1060 / GTX 970 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Higher
  • Processor: Intel 2 Duo 1.8 GHZ or AMD Athlon 64 2.0 GHZ
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 Ti, Radeon HD 6970, or equivalent, or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: For these graphics cards, or similar, the texture quality is best set to 1k. The game may run fine on lower hardware if the settings are lowered right down.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Something better than the GPUs in the minimum requirements, with 2GB or more of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Newer, higher end cards with more than 2GB of VRAM should be OK with 2K textures

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Quad Core
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: R9 270 or equivalent or better
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: System requirements will change as the game develops and are at this point largely unknown. You may find it runs perfectly well on lower hardware.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 9 and 256 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16-bit sound card
  • Additional Notes: Mouse, Keyboard

Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9.0
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D graphics card with 256MB of video memory
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mouse, Keyboard
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Additional Notes: Two button Mouse

requirements_en.minimum:
Ubuntu 14.04, 16.04 or newer

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum

  • Operating System: Microsoft® Windows® 2000/XP
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® III 800 Mhz or equivalent
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Hard Disk Space: 3.6 GB Available HDD Space
  • Video Card: ATI® Radeon® 8500 or NVIDIA® GeForce® 3 or 4 MX Series Video Card with 32MB of VRAM
  • Sound Card: 16-bit Sound Card
  • Internet Connection: required
requirements_en.recommended:

  • Operating System: Microsoft® Windows® 2000/XP
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® III 1 or equivalent
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Hard Disk Space: 3.6 GB Available HDD Space
  • Video Card: ATI® Radeon® 9000 or NVIDIA® GeForce® 4 Ti Series Video Card with 64MB of VRAM
  • Sound Card: 16-bit Sound Card
  • Internet Connection: Broadband Internet Connection
